name: Try NOT to survive
description:
Objective:

Your Goal is to DIE as quickly as possible. To do so you will have to gather resources, craft tools and machines to inflict yourself some damage.

Controls:

Keyboard: WASD to move, X to perform actions like mining and selecting tools, Z to go back, C to craft and E to open your inventory.

Controller: Left Joystick to move, A to perform actions like mining and selecting tools, B to go back, Y to craft and RB to open your inventory.

Note:

The game is not finished and it is still under development. Thanks for playing!
